/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/surface_mesh_ex1.dir/surface_mesh_ex1.cpp.o  -o surface_mesh_ex1  ../polyscope/src/libpolyscope.a ../polyscope/deps/imgui/libimgui.a ../polyscope/deps/glfw/src/libglfw3.a -lrt -lm -ldl -lX11 -lpthread ../polyscope/deps/glad/src/libglad.a ../polyscope/deps/stb/libstb.a
